https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9kD8bohNKE1truudhmeOtOjfNeH.jpg A motion comic follow-up to a chapter from Abraham Lincoln Vampire Hunter novel where Abe's friend, Edgar Allan Poe, tells him the tale of historical Hungarian countess Elizabeth Bathory, often tied to vampire legends due to her brutality.
